ch.unige.ng.halt
Interface HaltFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
AndFunction, EquationFunction, MaximumFitnessHalting, MaximumStepHalting, OrFunction, StableFitnessHalting
public interface HaltFunction

A haltFunction is used by the algorithm to know if the end of the algorithm is reached or not.

17 d?c. 2004
